    public class GUIControls
extends javax.swing.JPanel

    • 字段详细资料

      • UP_SPEEDS

        public static final java.lang.String[] UP_SPEEDS
        GUI update speeds. Negative values -> how many 1/10 seconds to wait between updates. Positive values -> show every Nth update

      • ZOOM_MIN

        public static final double ZOOM_MIN
        Smallest value for the zoom level
        另请参阅:
        常量字段值

      • ZOOM_MAX

        public static final double ZOOM_MAX
        Highest value for the zoom level
        另请参阅:
        常量字段值

      • INITIAL_SPEED_SELECTION

        public static final int INITIAL_SPEED_SELECTION
        index of initial update speed setting
        另请参阅:
        常量字段值

      • FFW_SPEED_INDEX

        public static final int FFW_SPEED_INDEX
        index of FFW speed setting
        另请参阅:
        常量字段值

    • 方法详细资料

      • setSimTime

        public void setSimTime(double time)
        Sets the simulation time that control panel shows
        参数:
        time - The time to show

      • setPaused

        public void setPaused(boolean paused)
        Sets simulation to pause or play.
        参数:
        paused - If true, simulation is put to pause

      • isPaused

        public boolean isPaused()
        Has user requested the simulation to be paused
        返回:
        True if pause is requested

      • isFfw

        public boolean isFfw()
        Is fast forward turned on
        返回:
        True if FFW is on, false if not

      • getUpdateInterval

        public double getUpdateInterval()
        Returns the selected update interval of GUI
        返回:
        The update interval (seconds)

      • changeZoom

        public void changeZoom(int delta)
        Changes the zoom level
        参数:
        delta - How much to change the current level (can be negative or positive)
